Translations.Text: Igihe Amajuru azo satagurika
Nigihe azo tega amatwi arekuriwe n’Umuremyi wayo
N’Isi nayo mugihe izo sanzazwa
N’ugukura ivyari muriyo igasigara igaragara
Igatega amatwi ku Muremyi wayo n’ukwemererwa
Wa muntu we ! mu vy’ukuri wewe urita kurutare kugeza aho muzohura n’Umuremyi wawe, rero ivyo bikorwa vyawe uzobisanga iwe
Nayo uwuzo habwa igitabu ciwe m’ukuboko kwiwe kw’iburyo
Rero uyo muntu azo harurwa n’ibiharuro vyoroshe cane
Kandi	azosubira	ku	bantu	biwe	mugihe	azoba	afise	akanya	kuneza ntangere
Mugabo uwuzo habwa igitabu ciwe imugongo
Uyo muntu azo saba urupfu
Kandi azo kwinjira mu muriro udahera
Kuko yari afise akanya muneza hamwe n’abiwe
Yiketse yuko atazo garuka ku Mana yiwe
N’ukubera iki atagarukira Umuremyi wiwe yamye amubona
Rero ndarahiye k’ugutukura kw’izuba bugorovye
No kw’Ijoro hamwe nivyo ryegeranye
No k’Ukwezi mugihe gukwijije imisi yakwo
Muzo hura n’ivyabaye hamwe n’ibindi
None bafise iki ko batemera
Mugihe basomewe iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu ntibayi gamburukira
Mugabo bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri baguma bahakana gusa
N’Imana niyo ifise ubumenyi bwivyo begeranya
Rero n’ubabwire ibihano bibabaza cane
Dukuyemwo abemeye Imana bimwe bivuye k’umitima yabo n’ukugira ibikorwa vyiza, abo nibo bazoba bafise impembo idahera
Ndarahiye ku Majuru afise Inyenyeri
No k’umusi w’isango bemerewe
N’uwuzoba icabona kuki boneshwa
Barahonejwe	abantu	batoteje	aba	Isilamubari	kubirindiro	vyabovyomubinogo
Bifise umuriro w’inkwi nyinshi cane
Mugihe bari bicaye ngaho
Nabo bitegereza ivyo bagirirwa abo ba Isilamu
Nabo batara bona inabi iyariyo yose kuri bo, atari ukwemera Imana yabo ariyo nyene intsinzi n’uguhayagizwa bimwe bikwiye
Ikaba ariyo nyene ubwami bw’Amajuru n’Isi, n’Imana niyo ibona ibintu vyose

Mu vy’ukuri bamwe batoteza aba Isilamu b’abagabo hamwe naba Isilamu kazi, hanyuma ntibasabe imbabazi, abo bantu bazoronka ibihano vyo mu muriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, kandi bazoronka ibihano biba turira neza cane
Mu vy’ukuri bamwe bemera Imana yabo y’ukuri, nukugira ibikorwa vyiza ntankeka bazoronka imirima irimwo inzuzi zica imbere yabo, iyi niyo ntsinzi niniya
Mu vy’ukuri uguhana kw’Umuremyi wawe kurakaze cane
Niyo yatanguje kurema ibiremwa vyose naniyo izobagarura
Nayo niyo ifise ikigongwe cinshi, n’ugukunda ibiremwa vyayo vyose
Nyene inyegamo y’iteka ntagatifu
Umugizi w’ukugira ico yishakiye cose
Mbega warashikiwe n’inkuru z’ingabo z’abatemera Imana yabo y’ukuri
Ariwe Fir’auni hamwe na Thamudu
Mugabo abahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri bagumye badadaza gusa
N’Imana iraba kikuje kumpande zose
Ahubwo iyi ni Qur’ani ntagatifu
Kuri urwo rubaho rushinguwe neza
Ndarahiye ku Majuru hamwe n’icoza mw’Ijoro
None n’igiki kizo kumenyesha ico kintu kizoza mw’Ijoro
N’Inyenyeri yaka cane
Nta mutima w’Umuntu uwariwe wese atari uko ufise uwuwu cungereye hejuru yiwe
Ahubwo umuntu niyirabe neza, yaremwe mu kintu nyabaki
Yaremwe mumazi asunitswe
Avuye hagati y’amagufa y’umugongo n’igikiriza
Mu vy’ukuri Imana irafise ubushobozi bw’ukumugarura
Umusi hazoserurwa amabanga y’abantu bose
Rero nta bushobozi azoba afise canke umufasha
Ndarahiye kubicu bizana imvura
No kw’Isi isaduka ikazana ibiterwa
Yuko iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu, n’imvugo itandukanya ukuri kwama
Kandi si ibijajuro
Mu vy’ukuri n’abagira ingeso kuzindi
Nanje izo ngeso zabo ndazitereye kure
Nubahe abo bahakanyi b’Imana y’ukuri, umwanya mutoyi gusa
